Uses of TrainException in asgn2RollingStock
 

Methods in asgn2RollingStock that throw TrainException
 void PassengerCar.alight(Integer departingPassengers)
          Removes the given number of passengers from this carriage.
 Integer PassengerCar.board(Integer newPassengers)
          Adds the given number of new passengers to the number on board the carriage.
 

Constructors in asgn2RollingStock that throw TrainException
FreightCar(Integer grossWeight, String goodsType)
          Constructs a freight car object.
Locomotive(Integer grossWeight, String classification)
          Constructs a new locomotive object with a fixed gross weight and classification code.
PassengerCar(Integer grossWeight, Integer numberOfSeats)
          Constructs a passenger car with a known weight and a fixed number of seats.
RollingStock(Integer grossWeight)
          Constructs a railway carriage with a specific gross weight (i.e., the carriage's weight when fully laden).
 

Uses of TrainException in asgn2Train
 

Methods in asgn2Train that throw TrainException
 void DepartingTrain.addCarriage(RollingStock newCarriage)
          Adds a new carriage to the end of the train.
 Integer DepartingTrain.board(Integer newPassengers)
          Adds the given number of people to passenger carriages on the train.
 void DepartingTrain.removeCarriage()
          Removes the last carriage from the train.
